name: Pinterest Clone - Card Component
description:
Develop an eye for good Ui & Ux by cloning Pinterest. In this short video I walk you through how I made the card component for the pins in Pinterest's home page.


This is the third video in the "Pinterest Clone in Figma" playlist.


"Pinterest Clone in Figma" is a Youtube playlist of very short videos, each video is focused on taking one or two small steps towards copying Pinterest in Figma


Watch a quick video tutorial
